parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Lock all cargo positions of a vehicle or lock by index.
This command will remove user "get in" action (not get out) but will also stop player getting into vehicle via script commands (e.g [[moveInCargo]]) unlike [[lock]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[lockCargo]] lock

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> lock: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> vehicle [[lockCargo]] [index, lock]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, lock]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> lock: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>vehicleName [[lockCargo]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>vehicleName [[lockCargo]] [0, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lock]], [[setVehicleLock]], [[lockDriver]], [[lockedCargo]], [[lockTurret]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
